name: df-alsc
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0
body: |- wb(walsc(s0, c0, w0), wa(wral(s0, c0, w0), wex(s0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))
comment: Define "all some" applied to a class, which means ` ph ` is true for all ` x ` in ` A ` and there is at least one ` x ` in ` A ` . (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 20-Oct-2018.)
